sections.heading: review agent; compensation; incentive or penalty; restrictions
sections.text: A utilization review agent shall not:(1) Be compensated based on its volume of denials; or(2) Base any incentive or penalty for a medical reviewer of such agent based on the volume of denials such reviewer issues or upholds.SourceLaws 20

44-5444.Utilization review agent; compensation; incentive or penalty; restrictions.

A utilization review agent shall not:

(1) Be compensated based on its volume of denials; or

(2) Base any incentive or penalty for a medical reviewer of such agent based on the volume of denials such reviewer issues or upholds.

SourceLaws 2025, LB77, ยง 13.Operative Date: January 1, 2026
